actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The malphas makes three longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Shadow Call
reactions.desc: A malphas can cast magic missile as a reaction when it is hit by a ranged weapon attack.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the storm crow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: magic missile

1/day: haste

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the malphas has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Night Terror (1/round)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action immediately after making a successful melee attack, a malphas storm crow can cast magic missile through his or her sword at the same target.

special_abilities.name: Swordtrained
special_abilities.desc: Malphas are trained from youth in combat. They are proficient with all martial melee and ranged weapons.
